column4: hi, I just installed jaunty. I am having a problem with xfontsel. TTF fonts such as ttf-inconsolata do not appear. (I want to use a program called dmenu, that's why I need this to work)
Use "xft-<ttf_font_name>" as the font. ttf fonts won't show up in xfontsel because it only shows X fonts
May or may not work... I'm sorry if it doesn't
then how come it show deja vu sans?
